application.description: This app is used for development and testing of the Knackpy API client.https://github.com/cityofaustin/knackpy/
application.name: Knackpy Development | PRODUCTION

views.description: this view is filtered for only records that are not PYTEST_RECORD = True. we destroy PYTEST records during tests, but if the test fails a record will remain here. we don't want to test those records, because our test suite evaluates records specifically created for testing, with all fields populated.

views.name: all fields
views.title: all fields

settings.inactivity_message: Still there? If so, click "Remain Logged In" below.

lockout_options.lockout_message: Account locked due to too many failed login attempts. Please wait before trying again.
lockout_options.lockout_user_email_message: For your security, we're alerting you to the fact that your account at https://atd.knack.com/knackpy-development-app-production has been locked out due to too many failed login attempts. If this was not you, please alert your admin right away: transportation.data@austintexas.gov
lockout_options.password_reset_message: You may also reset your password to unlock your account.

password_options.password_require_expiration_message: Your password has expired, please reset it below.
password_options.password_require_no_reuse_message: You cannot use a password you've previously used. Please try a different one.
